Key Features of Quality control for youtube tv chrome extension

1. Easy Activation: A simple click or shortcut to enable PiP mode directly from YouTube TV.
 2. Resizable Window: Allow users to adjust the size of the PiP window to their preference.
 3. Customizable Positioning: Enable users to drag and place the PiP window anywhere on the screen.
 4. Playback Controls: Integrate basic controls like play, pause, and skip within the PiP window.
 5. Auto-Adjustment: The PiP window could automatically move or resize during tasks like opening new tabs or applications to avoid obstruction..
 6. Multi-Screen Support: Compatibility with multiple monitors for users working with extended displays.
 8. Auto-Pause on Tab Change: Automatically pause the video when the user switches tabs or windows.
 9. Quality Adjustment: Ability to change the video quality within the PiP mode.
 10. Favorites and Playlist Integration: Quick access to favorite channels or playlists directly from the PiP interface.

How to use:-

Open your Google Chrome browser and navigate to the Chrome Web Store.
In the Chrome Web Store, use the search bar to find the "Quality Control for YouTube TV" extension.
Click on the extension in the search results. Then, press the "Add to Chrome" button to initiate the installation.
Once installed, the "Quality Control for YouTube TV" extension icon will appear in the top right corner of your Chrome browser.
If you are an Indian user, you need to install VPN extension also and select the country USA . (https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/free-vpn-for-chrome-vpn-p/majdfhpaihoncoakbjgbdhglocklcgno)
Open YouTube and select any video of your choice to play.
While your chosen video is playing, click on the extension icon in your browser.
A menu will appear, providing various quality options for your video. Select your desired video quality.
With your preferred quality selected, you can now enjoy an enhanced, high-definition streaming experience on YouTube.
